meanings.definition: The quality or state of being generic.
meanings.sent1: The genericness of the product made it hard to stand out among the competition.
meanings.sent2: The store's genericness made it easy to find what I needed quickly.
meanings.sent3: The genericness of the costume party theme led to everyone wearing the same outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her speech lacked any genericness, standing out with its unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The genericness of the landscape made it difficult to remember where we parked.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of lacking distinctiveness or individuality.
meanings.sent1: The genericness of the music made it blend into the background.
meanings.sent2: The genericness of the building's design made it look like every other office block.
meanings.sent3: The genericness of the joke fell flat with the audience.
meanings.sent4: His outfit screamed genericness, lacking any personal style.
meanings.sent5: The genericness of the painting made it forgettable among the vibrant artworks.
